about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, UTI AMC is in the business of managing the domestic mutual funds of UTI Mutual Fund, provides portfolio management services to institutional clients and high net worth individuals like Employee Provident Fund Organisation, National Skill Development Fund, Postal Life Insurance, and manages retirement funds viz. NPS, offshore funds like Shinsei UTI India Fund, and alternative investment funds catering to a diverse group of individuals, institutional investors, banks, trusts, and NRIs.

Key Facts about UTI AMC

  • According to CRISIL, UTI AMC is the largest AMC in India in terms of Total AUM, seventh-largest AMC in India in terms of mutual fund QAAUM with Rs 1,542.3 billion, and also has the largest share of monthly average AUM amongst top ten Indian AMC coming from B30 cities.
  • The management fees from domestic mutual funds account for 72.7% of the total income of the company.
  • UTI AMC has established the first mutual fund in India and has been in the asset management industry for more than 55 years with a strong history and proven track record in mutual fund mutual industry with strong brand recognition.
  • UTI AMC has 11 million live folios accounting for 12.8% of client base managed by the Indian mutual fund industry.
  • UTI AMC has a national footprint with 163 UTI Financial Centres, 273 Business Development Associates and Chief Agents and 33 other Official Points of Acceptance. UTI AMC also has approximately 51,000 Independent Financial Advisors.
  • UTI AMC has four sponsors SBI, LIC, PNB and BOB each of which has the Government of India as a majority shareholder. UTI AMC also has a global asset management company T. Rowe Price International Ltd as one of its major stakeholders with a 26% stake in the Company.
  • As of September 30, 2019, UTI AMC manages 178 domestic mutual fund schemes, comprising equity, hybrid, income, liquid, and money market funds.

faqs.question: What is the UTI AMC IPO?
faqs.answer:
UTI AMC IPO is a main-board IPO of 38987081 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2,159.88 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹554 per share. The minimum order quantity is 27.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2020, and closes on October 1, 2020.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in UTI AMC IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in UTI AMC IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in UTI AMC IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in UTI AMC IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'UTI AMC IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When UTI AMC IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The UTI AMC IPO opens on September 29, 2020 and closes on October 1, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of UTI AMC IPO?
faqs.answer: UTI AMC IPO lot size is 27, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,958.

faqs.question: How to apply for UTI AMC IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in UTI AMC IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is UTI AMC IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for UTI AMC IPO will be done on Wednesday, October 7, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, October 9, 2020. Check the UTI AMC IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is UTI AMC IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The UTI AMC IPO listing date is on Monday, October 12, 2020.
